dialogue.text: So we have lost #btwo seal stones#k so far, from the neighboring areas of #rOrbis#k and #rMu Lung#k... Things are starting to get out of control, it seems.

Aran, your next objective will be to use the #btime gate to Ellin#k again. This time you will be retrieving the long lost #rSeal Stone of Ellin Forest#k. According to informations our network have gathered, #b#p2131002##k of that time have a clue about that gem, #rfind her#k. Please be successful on this task, our world is relying on you more than ever!
